I’m just going to echo what a couple of other people have said: Lampard should not be sacked.

There’s no way the club would spend that much money in going after everyone Lampard wanted to give him the boot before Christmas.

Anyone calling for Lampard’s head even after a full season (in which we massively overachieved: need I remind everyone that the general consensus was that if we finished 10th we’d consider that a success?) is insane.

“Standards have to be kept” - people don’t forget that easily; just because we haven’t looked like a serial winning team for a season or two doesn’t mean that the club is slipping. We’re in a massive transitional period with a team that has potential to be one of the most dangerous, yet we have a 0-0 draw against Sevilla and let Saints stick 3 past us and people are fed up with it and want to bring in Pochettino?

Success doesn’t come overnight, and those that immediately expected us to be the best in the prem after making a couple of signings are deluded.

replies.msg:
Upamecano vs Koundé

全球中堅求才若渴，這是不爭事實。兩位同樣只得21歲，剛在上季歐聯和歐霸證明過自己實力的法國中堅Upamecano和Koundé，正準備進入豪門。

本文將會從防守和用球能力方面，分析兩人踢法特點。

防守能力

按兩人在上季聯賽表現，根據Squawka資料顯示，Upamecano 的地面防守能力較Koundé優勝。無論在Tackles, Ground duels contested, interceptions, Ball recoveries, Upamecano的數據全都比Koundé多出一倍。Upamecano的Tackles有51次，Ground duels contested有162次(成功率57.41%)，interceptions有43次，Ball recoveries有245次。相反，Koundé的Tackles只有23次，Ground duels contested只得80次(成功率63.75%)，interceptions有23次，Ball recoveries則有108次。除此之外，Upamecano經常依靠身體質素撞開對手又或攝位搶回皮球，因此，根據FBref資料顯示，Upamecano透過向對手施壓搶回皮球的成功率(Successful pressure %)亦較Koundé優勝(42.7%：41.8%)。

只不過，在制空力方面，身高只得178cm的Koundé就比Upamecano(186cm)優勝，主因是前者的升跳搶點時間拿捏得較準確。Koundé的Aerial duels contested 多達149次，比Upamecano多出64次，成功率63.09%

用球能力

根據FBref資料顯示，Upamecano的場均引球推進距離多達459.8碼，當中向前推進(progressive distance)就佔56%(即258.8碼)；而Koundé的場均引球推進距離只有238.1碼，當中向前推進佔50.6%(即120.5碼)。須知道RB萊比錫跟西維爾的後場buildup play風格有別，Upamecano是球隊在後場發動攻勢的第一點，因而推進次數較多，而西維爾則主張中堅在後場透過搓傳尋找中前場接應點。如是者，連帶傳球方向亦有所影響。兩人的傳球成功率雖然都接近90%，但Upamecano有34%傳球向前，而Koundé只得31%傳球向前。除此之外，Upamecano場均有2.48次作出40碼或以上的長傳轉向，以及11.2次在受壓情況下成功傳球，但Koundé只有1.01次長傳轉向和6.93次在受壓情況下成功傳球。只不過，Upamecano的Take-ons completed次數雖然比Koundé多(29次：18次)，但後者的Takes-on success % 卻比Upamecano高出9%

總結

在單對單防守時，Upamecano主要依靠身體質素撞開對手又或攝位搶回皮球，而Koundé則較多訓身落腳，通常看準機會才出腳攔截，另外，Koundé的制空力比Upamecano優勝。至於用球方面，Upamecano因應球隊戰術關係，在後場引球推進的表現完勝Koundé。雖然成名較早的Upamecano已代表大國腳上陣，但以Koundé目前的表現來看，預計兩人最快可以在下年歐洲國家盃之後便成為法國國家隊的正選中堅組合。
想買撚哂Kounde同Upamecano

According to Kicker, Upamecano's new contract includes a €42 million release clause, which will be active from next summer.

請問你既足球哲學係咩？

撚sir : 我好清楚自己想點踢 但我唔會話比大家聽

我亦都可以講得好好聽 就好似考練牌寫論文講自己既足球哲學咁

但現實上足球係千變萬化 所以唔會講實自己信邊一套

“I do have a pretty clear picture but I’m not one to sit here and lay out all my plans,”

“I find it’s always a tough question. It can sound brilliant, and sound like I’m finishing my Pro Licence [coaching badge] and putting in how I think my team should play. The reality of football is that it moves on a lot. Last season I think was very positive for us as a team because we had an identity of a team that worked very hard off the ball and created a lot of chances, tried to get higher up the pitch and made a lot of steps forward while also needing to make further steps.


The message cannot always be the same for players with different attributes. So that’s why I don’t want to commit to what would be my ideal philosophy in six months, a year’s time, two years’ time, because in real time you have to work with the players you have and just keep trying to improve.”
